df-esum
blocks.content: Define a short-hand for the possibly infinite sum over the extended nonnegative reals. ` sum* ` is relying on the properties of the ` tsums ` , developped by Mario Carneiro. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2016.)

blocks.name: esumex
blocks.content: An extended sum is a set by definition. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: esumcl
blocks.content: Closure for extended sum in the extended positive reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sseldd(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))))
  tsmscl(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))))
  xrge0base()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ccmn))
  xrge0cmn()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctps))
  xrge0tps()
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))), wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))))
  df-esum(s0, c0, c2)
  xrge0tsmsbi(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))))
  eqid(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))))
  nfan(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  nfel1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfra1(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  r19.21bi(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: esumeq12dvaf
blocks.content: Equality deduction for extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumeq12dvaf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c2, c3), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), w0)
  unieqd(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), w0)
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), wal(s0, wceq(c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3)))
  alrimi(s0, w0, wceq(c0, c2))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wceq(c1, c3))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c3))
  mpteq12f(s0, c0, c2, c1, c3)
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  df-esum(s0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: nfesum1
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfesum1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cesum(s0, c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wnfc(s0, cesum(s0, c0, c1)), wnfc(s0, c0))
  nfcxfr(s0, cesum(s0, c0, c1), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  nfuni(s0, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  nfov(s0, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  nfcv(s0, ctsu)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  diff.cxrs.s(s0)
  diff.cress.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.ctsu.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfesum1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(F/(s0, sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), F/(s0, c0))
  nfcxfr(s0, sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ⋃((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  nfuni(s0, ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  nfov(s0, (ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)), ctsu, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  nfcv(s0, (ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)))
  nfcv(s0, ctsu)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cxrs, cress, (0[[,]]+∞))
  diff.cxrs.s(s0)
  diff.cress.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.ctsu.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nfesum2
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfesum2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cesum(s1, c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cesum(s1, c0, c1), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s1, c0, c1))))
  df-esum(s1, c0, c1)
  nfuni(s0, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s1, c0, c1)))
  nfov(s0, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  nfcv(s0, ctsu)
  nfmpt(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  diff.cxrs.s(s0)
  diff.cress.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.ctsu.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfesum2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, sum*(s1 ∈ c0, c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, sum*(s1 ∈ c0, c1), ⋃((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  df-esum(s1, c0, c1)
  nfuni(s0, ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  nfov(s0, (ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)), ctsu, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  nfcv(s0, (ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)))
  nfcv(s0, ctsu)
  nfmpt(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cxrs, cress, (0[[,]]+∞))
  diff.cxrs.s(s0)
  diff.cress.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.ctsu.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cbvesum
blocks.content: Change bound variable in an extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvesum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s1, c0, c2), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s1, c0, c2))))
  unieqi(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s1, c0, c2)))
  oveq2i(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s1, c0, c2))
  cbvmptf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  df-esum(s1, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: cbvesumv
blocks.content: Change bound variable in an extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvesumv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  cbvesum(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvesumv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum*(s1 ∈ c0, c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  cbvesum(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}

blocks.name: esumid
blocks.content: Identify the extended sum as any limit points of the infinite sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
} = {
  syl6reqr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), c2, cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), w0)
  xrge0tsmseq(c2, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c3, w0)
  eqid(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm esumid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
} = {
  syl6reqr(sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1), c2, ⋃((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w0)
  xrge0tsmseq(c2, (ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c3, w0)
  eqid((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)))
  fmptdF(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, (0[[,]]+∞), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, (0[[,]]+∞))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: esumgsum
blocks.content: A finite extended sum is the group sum over the extended nonnegative real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumgsum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
} = {
  esumid(s0, c0, c1, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfn, w0)
  tsmsid(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), nat0, c0, cfn, w0)
  xrge0base()
  xrge00()
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ccmn))
  xrge0cmn()
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctps))
  xrge0tps()
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  fndmfifsupp(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), nat0, c0, cxr, w0)
  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fnmptf(s0, c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: esumval
blocks.content: Develop the value of the extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wceq(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cmpt(s0, cv(s1), c1)), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt), cuni(csn(csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt))), w0)
  syl5eq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cuni(csn(csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt))), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), w0)
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  unieqd(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csn(csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt)), w0)

thm esumval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ c2)), ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin))→((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[gsum](s0 ∈ s1 ↦ c1))= c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1), sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ c2)), ℝ*, <), ⋃ { sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ c2)), ℝ*, <)}, w0)
  syl5eq(sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ⋃ { sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ c2)), ℝ*, <)}, ⋃((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w0)
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  unieqd(((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), { sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ c2)), ℝ*, <)}, w0)
  xrge0tsmsd(s1, (ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ c2)), ℝ*, <), c0, c3, w0)
  eqid((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)))
  fmptdF(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, (0[[,]]+∞), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, (0[[,]]+∞))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  supeq1d(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ c2)), cxr, clt, ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[gsum]((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|` s1)))), w0)
  rneqd((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ c2), (s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[gsum]((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|` s1))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, (P(c0)⋂ Fin), c2, ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[gsum]((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|` s1)), w0)
  eqtr2d(c2, ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[gsum]((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|` s1)), ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[gsum](s0 ∈ s1 ↦ c1)), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)))
  oveq2d((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)), cgsu, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|` s1), (s0 ∈ s1 ↦ c1), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)))
  syl((w0 ∧ s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|` s1)=(s0 ∈ s1 ↦ c1), s1 ⊆ c0)
  adantl(w0, s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin), s1 ⊆ c0)
  elpwid(s1, c0, s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin))
  sseli(s1, (P(c0)⋂ Fin), P(c0))
  inss1(P(c0), cfn)
  resmptf(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, s1)
  unisn(sup(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ c2)), ℝ*, <))
  supex(ran((s1 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)↦ c2)), cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  diff.co.s(s1, cxrs, cress, (0[[,]]+∞))

blocks.content: The extended sum is a limit point of the corresponding infinite group sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Mar-2017.)

thm esumel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csn(cesum(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), csn(cesum(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  esumcl(s0, c0, c2, c1)
  snidg(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  xrge0tsmsd(hs0, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, w0)
  eqid(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  esumval(s0, hs0, c0, c1, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0))), c2, w0)
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  eqcomd(cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  elpwid(cv(hs0), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  sseldi(cv(hs0), cpw(c0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  inss1(cpw(c0), cfn)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  resmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

thm esumel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))

} = {
  eleqtrrd(sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), { sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)}, w0)
  syl(w0, sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ { sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)}, sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  syl2anc(w0, sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈(0[[,]]+∞), c0 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞)))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))

  eqid((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)))
  fmptdF(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, (0[[,]]+∞), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, (0[[,]]+∞))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  esumval(s0, hs0, c0, c1, ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[gsum]((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|` hs0)), c2, w0)
  oveq2d((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)), cgsu, (s0 ∈ hs0 ↦ c1), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)))
  eqcomd((s0 ∈ hs0 ↦ c1), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)))
  syl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)|` hs0)=(s0 ∈ hs0 ↦ c1), hs0 ⊆ c0)
  elpwid(hs0, c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)))
  sseldi(hs0, P(c0), (P(c0)⋂ Fin), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin)))
  inss1(P(c0), cfn)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋂ Fin))
  resmptf(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  eqcomi(cmpt(hs0, cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn), nat0), cxp(cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn), csn(nat0)))
  fconstmpt(hs0, cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn), nat0)
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cmpt(hs0, cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn), nat0), cxp(cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn), csn(nat0))), wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn), nat0)), csn(nat0))), wfn(cmpt(hs0, cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn), nat0), cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn)), wne(cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn), emptycls))
  ax-mp(wfn(cmpt(hs0, cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn), nat0), cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn)), wral(hs0, cin(cpw(emptycls), cfn), wcel(nat0, cxr)))

thm esumf1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  unieqd(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, ccom(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c4)), w0)

  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, ccom(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c4), cmpt(s1, c2, c3), w0)
  fmptcof2(s1, s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c4, c2, c3, c1, c0, c5, w0)

thm esumc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(c3, c1))

  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c5)))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c2, c5))

  fnmptf(s0, c0, c2, c5)
  a1i(w0, wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cab(s2, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c2)))))
  rnmpt(s2, s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, c2)

  dff1o2(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, cab(s2, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c2))))

  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))

  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c2)))), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s2, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c2)))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  elab(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  vex(s1)
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  eqeq1(cv(s2), cv(s1), c2)

thm esumc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum*(s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2)}, c3))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ (s1 = c2 → c3 = c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → Fun(`'(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqcomd(sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c1), sum*(s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2)}, c3), w0)
  esumf1o(s1, s0, { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2)}, c3, c0, c1, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c2, universe, w0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfab(s0, s2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2))
  nfre1(s0, c0, s2 = c2)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c2)
  abrexexd(s2, s0, c0, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c4)
  elex(c0, c4)
  syl3anbrc(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2): c0 ↔ { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2)}), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)[Fn]c0, Fun(`'(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))= { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2)})
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)[Fn]c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c5))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, c2 ∈ c5)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c5)
  fnmptf(s0, c0, c2, c5)
  a1i(w0, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))= { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2)})
  rnmpt(s2, s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c0, c2)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))
  dff1o2((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c0, { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2)})
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)` s0)= c2, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c5)
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  fvmpt2f(s0, c0, c2, c5)
  sylan2(w0, s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2)}, c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c3 = c1))
  sylbi(s1 ∈ { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2)}, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c3 = c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s1 = c2))
  elab(s2, s1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s1 = c2))
  vex(s1)
  rexbidv(s0, c0, s2 = s1, s2 = c2, s1 = c2)
  eqeq1(s2, s1, c2)
  reximi(s0, c0, s1 = c2, c3 = c1)
  imp(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c3 = c1), c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  rexlimd(s0, c0, w0, c3 = c1, c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  nfel(s0, c3, (0[[,]]+∞))
  nfcv(s0, (0[[,]]+∞))
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (c3 = c1 → c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞)))
  syl5ibrcom((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c3 = c1, c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞), c1 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  eleq1(c3, c1, (0[[,]]+∞))
  diff.cab.s(s1, s2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s2 = c2))
  diff.wrex.s(s1, s0, c0, s2 = c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s2, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wrex.s(s2, s0, c0, s1 = c2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: esumrnmpt
blocks.content: Rewrite an extended sum into a sum on the range of a mapping function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), c2), cesum(s1, c0, c3)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, cdif(c5, csn(emptycls))))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s1, c0, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl6reqr(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), c2), cesum(s1, c0, c3), cesum(s0, cab(hs0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), c2), w0)
  esumc(s1, s0, hs0, c0, c3, c1, c2, c4, cdif(c5, csn(emptycls)), w0)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  disjdsct(s1, c0, c1, c5, w0)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), c2), cesum(s0, cab(hs0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), c2)), wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), cab(hs0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  rnmpt(hs0, s1, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c0, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  esumeq1(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), cab(hs0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cab.s(s0, hs0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm esumrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), c2)= sum*(s1 ∈ c0, c3))
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→ c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(c5 \ { ∅ }))
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s1 ∈ c0, c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl6reqr(sum*(s0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), c2), sum*(s1 ∈ c0, c3), sum*(s0 ∈ { hs0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)}, c2), w0)
  esumc(s1, s0, hs0, c0, c3, c1, c2, c4, (c5 \ { ∅ }), w0)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  disjdsct(s1, c0, c1, c5, w0)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  ax-mp(sum*(s0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), c2)= sum*(s0 ∈ { hs0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)}, c2), ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))= { hs0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)})
  rnmpt(hs0, s1, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c1)
  eqid((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  esumeq1(s0, ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), { hs0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)}, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s0, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cab.s(s0, hs0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, c0, hs0 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: esumsplit
blocks.content: Split an extended sum into two parts. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), co(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxad, cesum(s0, c1, c2))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
} = {
  esumid(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2, co(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxad, cesum(s0, c1, c2)), universe, w0)
  tsmssplit(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxad, cesum(s0, c1, c2), co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cun(c0, c1), universe, c0, c1, w0)
  xrge0base()
  xrge0plusg()
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ccmn))
  xrge0cmn()
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctmd))
  xrge0tmd()
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cun(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  unexg(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c2, w0)
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  sylan2b(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  elun(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  jaodan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2))
  eleqtrrd(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c0)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), w0)
  esumel(s0, c0, c2, universe, w0)
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  mp1i(w0, wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), wss(c0, cun(c0, c1)))
  ssun1(c0, c1)
  resmptf(s0, c0, cun(c0, c1), c2)
  eleqtrrd(cesum(s0, c1, c2), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c1)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w0)
  esumel(s0, c1, c2, universe, w0)
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c1), cmpt(s0, c1, c2), w0)
  mp1i(w0, wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c1), cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), wss(c1, cun(c0, c1)))
  ssun2(c1, c0)
  resmptf(s0, c1, cun(c0, c1), c2)
  nfun(s0, c0, c1)
  eqidd(cun(c0, c1), w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm esumsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2)=(sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[+]sum*(s0 ∈ c1, c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
} = {
  esumid(s0, (c0 ⋃ c1), c2, (sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[+]sum*(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), universe, w0)
  tsmssplit(sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c2), cxad, sum*(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)), (s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)↦ c2), (0[[,]]+∞), (c0 ⋃ c1), universe, c0, c1, w0)
  xrge0base()
  xrge0plusg()
  a1i(w0, (ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))∈ CMnd)
  xrge0cmn()
  a1i(w0, (ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))∈ TopMnd)
  xrge0tmd()
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ⋃ c1)∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  unexg(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  fmptdF(s0, (s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)↦ c2), (c0 ⋃ c1), (0[[,]]+∞), c2, w0)
  nfcv(s0, (0[[,]]+∞))
  sylan2b(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞), (s0 ∈ c0 ∨ s0 ∈ c1))
  elun(s0, c0, c1)
  jaodan(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  eqid((s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)↦ c2))
  eleqtrrd(sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c2), ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums]((s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)↦ c2)|` c0)), ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), w0)
  esumel(s0, c0, c2, universe, w0)
  oveq2d((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)), ctsu, ((s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)↦ c2)|` c0), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), w0)
  mp1i(w0, ((s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)↦ c2)|` c0)=(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c0 ⊆(c0 ⋃ c1))
  ssun1(c0, c1)
  resmptf(s0, c0, (c0 ⋃ c1), c2)
  eleqtrrd(sum*(s0 ∈ c1, c2), ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums]((s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)↦ c2)|` c1)), ((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞))[tsums](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), w0)
  esumel(s0, c1, c2, universe, w0)
  oveq2d((ℝ*[|`s](0[[,]]+∞)), ctsu, ((s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)↦ c2)|` c1), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), w0)
  mp1i(w0, ((s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)↦ c2)|` c1)=(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c1 ⊆(c0 ⋃ c1))
  ssun2(c1, c0)
  resmptf(s0, c1, (c0 ⋃ c1), c2)
  nfun(s0, c0, c1)
  eqidd((c0 ⋃ c1), w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: esummono
blocks.content: Extended sum is monotonic. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esummono(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cle, cesum(s0, c2, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  breqtrd(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cle, cesum(s0, c2, c1), co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), w0)
  mpd(w0, wbr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cle, co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1))), wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)))
  syl(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), wcel(cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simprbi(wcel(cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), wcel(cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1), cxr))
  elxrge0(cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wi(wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), wbr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cle, co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)))), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxr), wcel(cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1), cxr))
  sseldi(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  esumcl(s0, c0, universe, c1)
  sseldi(cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), universe), wral(s0, cdif(c2, c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  ralrimi(s0, cdif(c2, c0), w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  esumcl(s0, cdif(c2, c0), universe, c1)
  xraddge02(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1))
  eqtr3d(co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), cesum(s0, c2, c1), cesum(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), c1), w0)

blocks.name: esumpad

thm esumpad(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  0e0iccpnf()

  ax-mp(wceq(cesum(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c1, c0)), c2), cesum(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2)), wceq(cun(c0, cdif(c1, c0)), cun(c0, c1)))
  undif2(c0, c1)

  sselda(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c0), c1, w0)
  difssd(c1, c0, w0)

  nfcv(s0, cdif(c1, c0))
  syl(w0, wceq(co(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxad, nat0), cesum(s0, c0, c2)), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxr))
  sseldi(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, c3), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

thm esumpad(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2)= sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)

  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)

  syl(w0, (c1 \ c0)∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ c4)
  difexg(c1, c4, c0)
  esum0(s0, (c1 \ c0), universe)
  nfcv(s0, (c1 \ c0))
  syl(w0, (sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[+]0)= sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c2), sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c2)∈ ℝ*)
  sseldi(sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c2), cxr, (0[[,]]+∞), w0)

  syl2anc(w0, sum*(s0 ∈ c0, c2)∈(0[[,]]+∞), c0 ∈ c3, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  esumcl(s0, c0, c3, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)

thm esumpad2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(co(c1, cxad, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

blocks.name: esumle
blocks.content: If all of the terms of an extended sums compare, so do the sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Jun-2017.)

thm esumle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  mpbid(w0, wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1)))), wbr(cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1))), cle, cpnf)), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1)))), wbr(cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1))), cle, cpnf))), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1))), cxr))

  a1i(w0, wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  elicc4(nat0, cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1))))
  imp(wa(wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxr), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1))), cxr)), wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1)))), wbr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cle, co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1))))))

  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1)))), co(cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1))), cxad, cesum(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxr), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, co(c2, cxad, cxne(c1))), cxr))
  sseldi(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, c3), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))

blocks.name: esumlub
blocks.content: The extended sum is the lowest upper bound for the partial sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumlub(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wbr(c1, clt, cesum(s1, cv(s0), c2))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))

thm esumsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c1)= c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c0)→ c1 = c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → sum*(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c1)= c2), d(s0, c3))
  esumsnf(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}

blocks.name: esumpr
blocks.content: Extended sum over a pair. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Jan-2017.)

thm esumpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, cxad, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cesum(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, cxad, c4), cesum(s0, cun(csn(c0), csn(c1)), c2), co(cesum(s0, csn(c0), c2), cxad, cesum(s0, csn(c1), c2)), w0)
  mp1i(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), cesum(s0, cun(csn(c0), csn(c1)), c2)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cun(csn(c0), csn(c1))))
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  esumeq1(s0, cpr(c0, c1), cun(csn(c0), csn(c1)), c2)
  esumsplit(s0, csn(c0), csn(c1), c2, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfcv(s0, csn(c0))
  nfcv(s0, csn(c1))
  a1i(w0, wcel(csn(c0), universe))
  snex(c0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(csn(c1), universe))
  snex(c1)
  syl(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c0), csn(c1)), emptycls), wne(c0, c1))
  disjsn2(c0, c1)
  eqeltrd(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  elsni(cv(s0), c0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  eqeltrd(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)), wceq(c2, c4), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  elsni(cv(s0), c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)), wcel(c4, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  oveq12d(cesum(s0, csn(c0), c2), cxad, cesum(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3, c4, w0)
  esumsn(s0, c0, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  esumsn(s0, c1, c2, c4, c6, w0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, csn(c0), csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm esumpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2)=(c3[+]c4))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c0)→ c2 = c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c1)→ c2 = c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(sum*(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2), (c3[+]c4), sum*(s0 ∈({ c0 } ⋃ { c1 }), c2), (sum*(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2)[+]sum*(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2)), w0)
  mp1i(w0, sum*(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2)= sum*(s0 ∈({ c0 } ⋃ { c1 }), c2), { c0, c1 } =({ c0 } ⋃ { c1 }))
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  esumeq1(s0, { c0, c1 }, ({ c0 } ⋃ { c1 }), c2)
  esumsplit(s0, { c0 }, { c1 }, c2, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfcv(s0, { c0 })
  nfcv(s0, { c1 })
  a1i(w0, { c0 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(c0)
  a1i(w0, { c1 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(c1)
  syl(w0, ({ c0 } ⋂ { c1 })= ∅, c0 ≠ c1)
  disjsn2(c0, c1)
  eqeltrd(c2, (0[[,]]+∞), c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ { c0 }))
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2 = c3, s0 = c0)
  elsni(s0, c0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ { c0 }, c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  eqeltrd(c2, (0[[,]]+∞), c4, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ { c1 }))
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2 = c4, s0 = c1)
  elsni(s0, c1)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ { c1 }, c4 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  oveq12d(sum*(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2), cxad, sum*(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2), c3, c4, w0)
  esumsn(s0, c0, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  esumsn(s0, c1, c2, c4, c6, w0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, { c0 }, { c1 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: esumpr2
blocks.content: Extended sum over a pair, with a relaxed condition compared to ~ esumpr . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Jan-2017.)

thm esumpr2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, cxad, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))

  syl5req(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c0), cpr(c0, c0), wceq(c0, c1))

  preq2(c0, c1, c0)
  esumeq1(s0, cpr(c0, c1), csn(c0), c2)
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cesum(s0, csn(c0), c2), c3))
  esumsn(s0, c0, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  imp(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c3, cxad, c3), c3))
  syl6(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c3, cxad, c3), c3), wo(wceq(c3, nat0), wceq(c3, cpnf)))
  jaoi(wceq(c3, nat0), wceq(c3, cpnf), wceq(co(c3, cxad, c3), c3))
  eqtrd(co(c3, cxad, c3), c3, co(c3, cxad, nat0), wceq(c3, nat0))
  oveq2(c3, nat0, c3, cxad)
  syl(wceq(c3, nat0), wceq(co(c3, cxad, nat0), c3), wcel(c3, cxr))
  mpbiri(wceq(c3, nat0), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  eleq1(c3, nat0, cxr)
  xaddid1(c3)
  3eqtr4d(co(c3, cxad, c3), c3, co(c3, cxad, cpnf), cpnf, wceq(c3, cpnf))
  syl2anc(wceq(c3, cpnf), wceq(co(c3, cxad, cpnf), cpnf), wcel(c3, cxr), wne(c3, cmnf))
  mpbiri(wceq(c3, cpnf), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  eleq1(c3, cpnf, cxr)
  mpbiri(wceq(c3, cpnf), wne(c3, cmnf), wne(cpnf, cmnf))
  pnfnemnf()
  neeq1(c3, cpnf, cmnf)
  xaddpnf1(c3)
  oveq2(c3, cpnf, c3, cxad)
  id(wceq(c3, cpnf))
  oveq2d(c3, cxad, c3, c4, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  eqtr3d(c3, c4, cesum(s0, csn(c1), c2), wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  esumsn(s0, c1, c2, c3, c6, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))

  biimprd(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq2(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c6))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cesum(s0, csn(c1), c2), c4))
  esumsn(s0, c1, c2, c4, c6, w0)
  esumpr(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, wa(w0, wne(c0, c1)))

  simpr(w0, wne(c0, c1))

  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wne(c0, c1))
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, c1)

blocks.pretty:
thm esumpr2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2)=(c3[+]c4))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c0)→ c2 = c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c1)→ c2 = c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 = c1 →(c3 = 0 ∨ c3 = +∞)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, c1, w0, sum*(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2)=(c3[+]c4))
  3eqtr2d(sum*(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2), (c3[+]c4), c3, (c3[+]c3), (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  eqtrd(sum*(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2), c3, sum*(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2), (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  3syl((w0 ∧ c0 = c1), sum*(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2)= sum*(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2), c0 = c1, { c0, c1 } = { c0 })
  syl5req({ c0, c1 }, { c0 }, { c0, c0 }, c0 = c1)
  dfsn2(c0)
  preq2(c0, c1, c0)
  esumeq1(s0, { c0, c1 }, { c0 }, c2)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, sum*(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2)= c3)
  esumsn(s0, c0, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  imp(w0, c0 = c1, (c3[+]c3)= c3)
  syl6(w0, c0 = c1, (c3[+]c3)= c3, (c3 = 0 ∨ c3 = +∞))
  jaoi(c3 = 0, c3 = +∞, (c3[+]c3)= c3)
  eqtrd((c3[+]c3), c3, (c3[+]0), c3 = 0)
  oveq2(c3, nat0, c3, cxad)
  syl(c3 = 0, (c3[+]0)= c3, c3 ∈ ℝ*)
  mpbiri(c3 = 0, c3 ∈ ℝ*, 0 ∈ ℝ*)
  0xr()
  eleq1(c3, nat0, cxr)
  xaddid1(c3)
  3eqtr4d((c3[+]c3), c3, (c3[+]+∞), cpnf, c3 = +∞)
  syl2anc(c3 = +∞, (c3[+]+∞)= +∞, c3 ∈ ℝ*, c3 ≠ -∞)
  mpbiri(c3 = +∞, c3 ∈ ℝ*, +∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  pnfxr()
  eleq1(c3, cpnf, cxr)
  mpbiri(c3 = +∞, c3 ≠ -∞, +∞ ≠ -∞)
  pnfnemnf()
  neeq1(c3, cpnf, cmnf)
  xaddpnf1(c3)
  oveq2(c3, cpnf, c3, cxad)
  id(c3 = +∞)
  oveq2d(c3, cxad, c3, c4, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  eqtr3d(c3, c4, sum*(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2), (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  esumsn(s0, c1, c2, c3, c6, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ c0 = c1)∧ s0 = c1), c2 = c3, w0, s0 = c0)
  simpll(w0, c0 = c1, s0 = c1)
  imp((w0 ∧ c0 = c1), s0 = c1, s0 = c0)
  syl((w0 ∧ c0 = c1), (s0 = c1 → s0 = c0), c0 = c1)
  simpr(w0, c0 = c1)
  biimprd(c0 = c1, s0 = c1, s0 = c0)
  eqeq2(c0, c1, s0)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c1 ∈ c6)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, sum*(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2)= c4)
  esumsn(s0, c1, c2, c4, c6, w0)
  esumpr(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c1))
  adantlr(w0, c0 ≠ c1, s0 = c0, c2 = c3)
  adantlr(w0, c0 ≠ c1, s0 = c1, c2 = c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c1, c0 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c1, c1 ∈ c6)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c1, c3 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c1, c4 ∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  simpr(w0, c0 ≠ c1)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 ≠ c1)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: esumrnmpt2

thm esumrnmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

blocks.name: esumfzf
blocks.content: Formulating a partial extended sum over integers using the recursive sequence builder. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: esumpmono

blocks.name: esumcocn
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ esummulc2 and co. Composing with a continuous function preserves extended sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: esumcvg
blocks.content: The sequence of partial sums of an extended sum converges to the whole sum. cf. ~ fsumcvg2 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:

  diff.cesum.s(s2, s3, (1[...]hs0), c3)

  diff.cfz.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: esumcvgsum

thm esumcvgsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cn, c0), csu(s0, cn, c0)))

} = {

  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat1)))

  sseqtri(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cr, co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf))

  mnfxr()
  ax-mp(wbr(cmnf, clt, nat0), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  mnflt(nat0)
  ax-mp(wbr(cpnf, cle, cpnf), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  pnfge(cpnf)
  icossioo(cmnf, cpnf, nat0, cpnf)
  ioomax()
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  elfznn(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(hs0, cn, cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cv(hs0))), cdm(cli), cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), w0)
  mpbi(wceq(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cmpt(hs0, cn, cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cv(hs0)))), wfn(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cn))
  mpbir(wfn(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cn), wfn(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cfv(cuz, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cz))
  1z()
  seqfn(nat1, caddc, c2)
  ax-mp(wb(wfn(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cn), wfn(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cfv(cuz, nat1))), wceq(cn, cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  nnuz()

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
}

thm esumcvgsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum*(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0)= sum(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ)→ c0 ∈(0[[,)]+∞))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ)→(c2 ` s0)= c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(1(+, c2))[~~>]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  esumpcvgval(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, w0)
  eqeltrd((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦ sum(s0 ∈(1[...]hs0), c0)), dom(~~>), (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(seq(1(+, c2))` hs0)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(hs0, cn, sum(s0 ∈(1[...]hs0), c0), (seq(1(+, c2))` hs0), w0)
  fsumser(s0, nat1, hs0, c0, c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ)∧ s0 ∈(1[...]hs0)), (c2 ` s0)= c0, w0, s0 ∈ ℕ)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 1))
  biimpi(hs0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 1))
  eleq2i(hs0, cn, (ℤ≥ ` 1))
  recnd(c0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ)∧ s0 ∈(1[...]hs0)))
  sseldi(c0, cr, (0[[,)]+∞), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ)∧ s0 ∈(1[...]hs0)))
  sseqtri((0[[,)]+∞), cr, (-∞[(,)]+∞))
  mp4an((0[[,)]+∞)⊆(-∞[(,)]+∞), -∞ ∈ ℝ*, +∞ ∈ ℝ*, -∞[<]0, +∞[≤]+∞)
  mnfxr()
  ax-mp(-∞[<]0, 0 ∈ ℝ)
  0re()
  mnflt(nat0)
  ax-mp(+∞[≤]+∞, +∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  pnfxr()
  pnfge(cpnf)
  icossioo(cmnf, cpnf, nat0, cpnf)
  ioomax()
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ)∧ s0 ∈(1[...]hs0)), c0 ∈(0[[,)]+∞), w0, s0 ∈ ℕ)
  simpll(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ, s0 ∈(1[...]hs0))
  adantl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ), s0 ∈(1[...]hs0), s0 ∈ ℕ)
  elfznn(s0, hs0)
  syl5eqelr((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(seq(1(+, c2))` hs0)), dom(~~>), seq(1(+, c2)), w0)
  mpbi(seq(1(+, c2))=(hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(seq(1(+, c2))` hs0)), seq(1(+, c2))[Fn]ℕ)
  mpbir(seq(1(+, c2))[Fn]ℕ, seq(1(+, c2))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` 1))
  ax-mp(seq(1(+, c2))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` 1), 1 ∈ ℤ)
  1z()
  seqfn(nat1, caddc, c2)
  ax-mp((seq(1(+, c2))[Fn]ℕ ↔ seq(1(+, c2))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` 1)), ℕ =(ℤ≥ ` 1))
  nnuz()
  fneq2(cn, (ℤ≥ ` 1), seq(1(+, c2)))
  dffn5(hs0, seq(1(+, c2)), cn)
  syl3anc(w0, seq(1(+, c2))∈ dom(~~>), seq(1(+, c2))∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈ ℝ, seq(1(+, c2))[~~>]c3)
  a1i(w0, seq(1(+, c2))∈ 𝕌)
  seqex(nat1, caddc, c2)
  breldmg(seq(1(+, c2)), universe, c3, cr, cli)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ)

thm esumsup(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cn, c0), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))), cxr, clt)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cn, c0), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))), cxr, clt))), wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))

  3eqtr3d(cesum(s0, cn, c0), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))), cxr, clt), cesum(s0, cn, cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, c0), cv(s0))), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0))), cxr, clt), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cn, cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, c0), cv(s0))), csup(crn(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0))), cxr, clt)), wf(cmpt(s0, cn, c0), cn, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  esumfsup(s0, cmpt(s0, cn, c0))
  esumeq2dv(s0, cn, cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, c0), cv(s0)), c0, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, c0), cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  supeq1d(crn(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0))), cxr, clt, crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))), w0)
  rneqd(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0)), w0)
  eqtr4d(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0)), cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cv(s1))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cv(s1)))))
  mpbi(wceq(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cv(s1)))), wfn(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cn))
  mpbir(wfn(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cn), wfn(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cfv(cuz, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cz))
  1z()
  seqfn(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0))
  fneq2i(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cn, cfv(cuz, nat1))
  nnuz()
  dffn5f(s1, cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cn)
  nfcv(s1, cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)))
  mpteq2dva(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0), cfv(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cv(s1)), w0)
  eqtr3d(cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0), cfv(cseq(nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0)), cv(s1)), cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, c0), cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)))

  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, c0), cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

  fmpttd(s0, cn, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  esumfzf(s0, cmpt(s0, cn, c0), cv(s1))
  nfmpt1(s0, cn, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)

  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cseq.s(s1, nat1, cxad, cmpt(s0, cn, c0))
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cxad.s(s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, cn, c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn))

blocks.name: esumgect
blocks.content: "Send ` n ` to ` +oo ` " in an inequality with an extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumgect(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cesum(s0, cn, c0), cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wbr(cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0), cle, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqbrtrd(cesum(s0, cn, c0), cle, c1, csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))), cxr, clt), w0)
  esumsup(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  mpbird(w0, wbr(csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))), cxr, clt), cle, c1), wral(hs0, crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))), w0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  r19.29af(s1, cn, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0)))
  nfan(s1, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0)))))
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfel(s1, cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfrn(s1, cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0)))
  nfmpt1(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))
  eqbrtrd(cv(hs0), cle, c1, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0), wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))))), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wceq(cv(hs0), cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))))
  simpr(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))))), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wceq(cv(hs0), cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))))), wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wceq(cv(hs0), cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))), wbr(cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0), cle, c1), w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn))
  simplll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cn), wceq(cv(hs0), cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0)))
  simplr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))))), wcel(cv(s1), cn), wceq(cv(hs0), cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0)))), wrex(s1, cn, wceq(cv(hs0), cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))))

blocks.name: esumcvgre
blocks.content: All terms of a converging extended sum shall be finite. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumcvgre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpdan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  r19.21bi(s0, c0, w0, wn(wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  sylibr(w0, wral(s0, c0, wn(wceq(c1, cpnf))), wn(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))))
  pm2.65da(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)), wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cpnf))
  esumpinfval(s0, c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  nfre1(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))
  adantr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)), wcel(c0, c2))
  adantlr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simpr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  neneqd(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cpnf, wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))))
  mpbi(wi(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))), wne(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cpnf)), wi(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))), wne(cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)), wne(cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, c1)))
  gtned(cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), clt, cpnf), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  ltpnf(cesum(s0, c0, c1))
  imbi2i(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))), wne(cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, c1)), wne(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cpnf))
  necom(cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, c1))
  ralnex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))
  orcanai(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, cpnf), wcel(c1, cr))
  orcomd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, cpnf), wcel(c1, cr))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wo(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wo(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf))
  eliccxr(c1, nat0, cpnf)
  xrge0neqmnf(c1)
  biimpi(wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)), wo(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)))

}

blocks.name: esum2d
blocks.content: Write a double extended sum as a sum over a two-dimensional region. Note that ` B ( j ) ` is a function of ` j ` . This can be seen as "slicing" the relation ` A ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm esum2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c3)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)

blocks.name: esumiun
blocks.content: Sum over a nonnecessarily disjoint indexed union. The inequality is strict in the case where the sets B(x) overlap. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2019.)
